short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groups your tabs on Chrome with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GroupEM is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you to organize your tabs by domain. With a single click, you can group all of your tabs that have the same domain and set the appropriate color. This makes it easy to quickly find the tabs that you are looking for and to keep your browser window organized.

Features:

- Automatically groups tabs by domain
- Assigns a unique color to each group
- Lightweight and fast

Benefits:

- Improves productivity by making it easy to find and organize tabs
- Reduces clutter by grouping related tabs together
- Makes your browser window look more organized

How to use:

- Install the GroupEM extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Pin GroupEM's icon to the Chrome taskbar by clicking on the Extensions icon and selecting GroupEM.
- Click on GroupEM's icon in the Chrome taskbar.
- All of your tabs will be grouped by domain.

Download GroupEM today and start organizing your tabs like a pro!
